plot: Middle Ages: A group of vikings raids a Christian village, killing everyone they find there. But what they don't know is that there lives a young witch called Ximena. And she is gonna unleash her power to save the boy that she loves.
title: Of Vikings and Zombies
plot_es: Middle Ages: A group of vikings raids a Christian village, killing everyone they find there. But what they don't know is that there lives a young witch called Ximena. And she is gonna unleash her power to save the boy that she loves.
